description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=1/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=1/3. Snakez Gunz & Ladderz. Guide snake through multiple levels in this vertical scrolling platform adventure to reach the end of level eggs! Featuring multiple hazards, traps and gun toting bugs along the way! Have you got what it takes to become a Top Snaker!
description.short: Snakez Gunz & Ladderz. Guide snake through multiple levels in this vertical scrolling platform adventure to reach the end of level eggs! Featuring multiple hazards, traps and gun toting bugs along the way! Have you got what it takes to become a Top Snaker!
